title: Nurse wo Kanojo ni Suru Houhou
original_name: ナースを彼女にする方法
sinopse:
Tajima Kaito has just started his new job as a male nurse. But there's something peculiar about the hospital where he's been hired. The female nurses show a keen interest in him, and he finds himself the center of attention, and constantly distracted as he tries to succeed at his new job.

(Source: Solaris-SVU)
